Prerequisites & Setup

Before you begin, ensure the following:

  • Download and install SHAREit Lite APK from a trusted source.
  • Ensure both devices (sender and receiver) are connected to the same Wi-Fi network or have Bluetooth enabled.
  • Grant necessary permissions (e.g., storage, location) for the app to function properly.

Core Step-by-Step Guide

Step 1: Launch SHAREit Lite

Tap on the SHAREit Lite icon on your home screen or app drawer to open the app.

On the main screen, tap 'Start' to begin the setup process. Follow the on-screen prompts to grant permissions and configure basic settings.

Step 3: Send Files

Step 4: Receive Files

On the receiver‚Äôs device, tap 'Receive'. Wait for the sender to select your device, and the transfer will begin automatically.

Common Mistakes to Avoid

  • Not enabling Wi-Fi or Bluetooth: Ensure both devices are connected to the same network or have Bluetooth turned on.
  • Interrupting the transfer: Avoid closing the app or turning off the screen during file transfer.
  • Ignoring permissions: Grant all necessary permissions to avoid functionality issues.

Final Checklist & Key Takeaways

  • Install SHAREit Lite APK and grant necessary permissions.
  • Connect both devices to the same Wi-Fi network or enable Bluetooth.
  • Use 'Send' and 'Receive' to transfer files effortlessly.
  • Explore 'Tools' for additional features like cleaning junk and managing files.
  • Avoid interrupting transfers and ensure permissions are enabled for smooth operation.
